events.text: Oh! How my son’s brilliance shines! Were he a bulb surely I would be blinded, yet eyes are not needed to bask in such light!
His artwork… were he not my son I daresay he had made a Faustian deal. He is one of few who can become a giant whose shoulders future artists stand upon!
Such a gifted child must be allowed the opportunity of expression, of being able to master this craft!
Oh, he’s preparing to paint! He seems to be looking for a colour palette to use now. Perhaps he needs another to provide inspiration…
